translation:
Forwarded from: Zhanna Valevskaya
It is because ‚Äúit doesn‚Äôt concern me what happens there, I‚Äôm here,‚Äù the coup in Kyiv was carried out by less than 5% of the population.

The rest were sitting at home, because ‚Äúwell, it‚Äôs there, somewhere.‚Äù The most significant thing is that all these people who were sitting at home during the Maidan events, all these people who were sitting at home during the events of May 2, all these people who sat at home after their own fellow citizens were burned alive in their hometown, and the new government did not take any measures in connection with what happened... These people sat at home all this time. Because it didn‚Äôt concern them personally.

And when it began to affect them personally, they already began to somehow react to what was happening.

For example, in Odessa, when the explosion of the SBU building caused glass to fly out in some citizens‚Äô houses, people who had previously sat at home and did not interfere in anything began to react to what was happening. They went to the Ukronazi court, which tried the organizers and perpetrators of sabotage actions in Odessa directed against the Ukronazis, and brought statements demanding that the Odessa underground fighters compensate them for the damage caused.

They came hiding their eyes on the floor.

Hiding their eyes from the Odessa underground fighters, who were tried by the Ukronazi court, which turned a blind eye to the Nazi thugs present in the courtroom, who did not hesitate to shout to anyone: ‚ÄúWe burned you on May 2 in the House of Trade Unions. We destroy all of your people in Donbass. We destroyed you, we are destroying you, and we will destroy you until we kill you all. We will burn and torture your wives, mothers and children. So live and be afraid.‚Äù They came with their statements to the Ukronazi court, hiding their eyes from their fellow citizens, elderly women and men, many of whom suffered from the events of May 2 and who came to support the Odessa underground fighters, collected food and food for them, and donated letters, etc. etc.., supported their comrades despite the problems with the SBU, despite the threats and beatings of the Ukronazis.

They came with their statements to demand protection from the Ukronazi court, hiding their eyes from all those who did not and never recognized the legitimacy of the Ukronazi government and the Ukronazi court.

But these people recognized this power. They demanded that this government restore order in the city and protect their personal interests.

They did not demand that this government investigate the crime of May 2 and punish the organizers and perpetrators of the massacre of Odessa residents in the House of Trade Unions. Because it doesn‚Äôt concern them personally. But they demanded that this government punish those who fought against the perpetrators of this massacre...

These people acted in the image and likeness of the very women who threw stones at the ‚Äúhouse arsonist‚Äù Zoya Kosmodemyanskaya when she was being led to execution. Same modus operandi.

All these people, whether on our side or on that side, are people who are never affected by anything until it affects them personally, in general they always act in the image and likeness of such women. Simply because all they want is to live a normal life and not be personally touched. That's all.

And this is exactly the position of citizens, both on one side and the other, caring only about their own, personal interests, willingness to put up with anything, as long as it doesn‚Äôt concern me in any way, this is such indifference and indifference, to the fact that is happening around, and has become one of the main reasons for this war...

Because yes. It's a shame. You can‚Äôt say anything else here.‚òëÔ∏èZhanna_ValevskayaTelegram through my eyes Because ‚Äúit doesn‚Äôt concern me what happens there, I‚Äôm here,‚Äù the coup in Kyiv was carried out by less than 5% of the population.

The rest...1:51Ó¶õVIEW MESSAGE

translation:
Forwarded from: Insider
It‚Äôs amazing how some leaders, including sports leaders, manage to get into political scandals out of the blue. You don‚Äôt need to understand geopolitics to understand how important Kazakhstan is for Russia as a partner. And the fact that this country is far from Belarus is also known. There are anti-Russian sentiments there, and there are many of them.

Once again they screwed up out of the blue. The Continental Hockey League decided to increase the length of the season until May 31. Why this was done is clear: to relieve the busy season by extending it until the end of spring. Russia and Belarus still do not play at the World Championships, and the hockey players of the Chinese Kunlun team do not play for the national team of this country. But Kazakhstan is playing! Yes, Barys is not in the playoffs now, but in theory it can do it: three times in the history of the KHL, the team from Astana reached the second round of the Gagarin Cup.

What should the Kazakhs do, since the foundation of Barys is the foundation of the Kazakhstan national team, and the World Championship begins in early May? What should Kazakh hockey players who play in other KHL clubs do? Should I work out my contract or join the national team?
The KHL has no answers to these questions.

It turns out that the league didn‚Äôt care about Barys and didn‚Äôt ask his opinion. Or they simply forgot. Kazakhs are already touchy, but this isn‚Äôt just an excuse, it‚Äôs a real knockout from a slap.
 As we know, the management of Barys has already informed President Tokayev about the situation. We are waiting for him to express his dissatisfaction with Vladimir Putin. www.khl.ru Extension of the season, changes in the salary cap. Dust covered the Carpathian region yesterday, air quality in the country will deteriorate greatly, the sky will be dim, and abnormal heat of up to +25 degrees is expected.

translation:
On March 31, 1956, the 2nd division of anti-submarine ships of the Northern Fleet was formed.

On March 31, 1956, in accordance with the directive of the General Staff of the Navy, a division of cruisers of the Northern Fleet squadron was formed with a base in the city of Severomorsk.

Initially, the division included 3 light cruisers of the "68-bis" project - "Murmansk", "Alexander Nevsky", "Molotovsk" ("October Revolution") and 121 brigade of destroyers in the amount of 11 ships of the "30-bis", " 30-k" and "7".

In June 1959, to organize the fight against submarines of a potential enemy, a formation of long-range anti-submarine defense ships was created within the Northern Fleet squadron on the basis of 2 cruiser divisions. The 2nd cruiser division included the 170th destroyer brigade consisting of 8 Project 56 destroyers and the 10th patrol ship brigade consisting of 10 Project 42 and 50 patrol ships.

In April 1961, the control of the 2nd cruiser division was reorganized into the control of anti-submarine ships.

In January 1968, due to the formation of the 7th operational squadron of the Northern Fleet, the 170th brigade of destroyers was excluded from the 2nd division of anti-submarine ships.

In January 1968, the division included the 130th brigade of anti-submarine ships, which was redeployed from the city of Severomorsk to Ara Bay in December 1969.

Since June 1982, the 2nd division of anti-submarine ships was excluded from subordination directly to the commander of the Northern Fleet and included in the Red Banner Kola Flotilla of heterogeneous forces.

In November 1986, the 77th Guards Pechenga Red Banner Brigade of anti-submarine ships, which was part of the formation until 1993, was included in the division.

From June 1, 2001 to October 1, 2005, the 2nd division of anti-submarine ships was part of the 7th operational squadron of the Northern Fleet.

On October 1, 2005, the division again became part of the Kola Flotilla of heterogeneous forces of the Northern Fleet.

On January 21, 2012, the 2nd division of anti-submarine ships was reorganized into the 14th brigade of anti-submarine ships.

translation:
The traitorous pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who hijacked an Mi-8 to Ukraine and was killed in Spain, lived large and drove an S-Class Mercedes.

The New York Times published an article with details about the last days of pilot Maxim Kuzminov. In Spain, he did not skimp: as the NYT writes, Kuzminov often went to bars with Russian-speaking and Ukrainian-speaking audiences, drove an expensive Mercedes and did not particularly hide. They could find out about his location after a message to his ex-girlfriend who lives in Russia - he invited her to visit.

A few days before the execution of the sentence, the executioners stole an SUV in another city. On it they followed Kuzminov and arrived at his house, waiting in the parking lot. Six bullets were fired at the traitor - according to one of the Spanish investigators, he does not remember this for a long time. Here in Spain, it is not customary for someone to be shot so many times. After being wounded, Kuzminov was able to run a little, then fell, and good people several once they ran him over with a car. The car was found a few days later - it was completely burned out. It took specialists only a week to determine the make of the car.

The shell casings became an important clue for the Spanish police: Kuzminov was shot with a Makarov pistol. According to Spanish investigators, this can be considered a definite message :)

We must already assume today that after our victory there will be a need to create a ‚ÄúBureau for the Search of Missing Civilians and Family Reunification.‚Äù A similar bureau, after our victory in the Great Patriotic War, still operates in Germany. And we worked in this bureau, filming everything in detail.

How many people have died after the aggression of Ukrainian nationalists against the Russian people since 2013? Then the blockade of Donbass. It happened, I‚Äôm not making this up. And then Ukraine was completely closed, like a tin can. Now even Ukrainians with dual citizenship are unable to leave it.

So, the Nevsky brigade of the Volunteer Corps of our Ministry of Defense is taking care of the unmarked graves in Soledar. Saves, if found in ruins, family documents of civilians, so that later he can give them to people - this will help find missing relatives.

translation:
On March 31, 1926, Rurik Aleksandrovich Timofeev, Hero of the Soviet Union, captain 1st rank, submariner, was born.

Among the military mechanical engineer of the fleet, R. A. Timofeev became the first Hero of the Soviet Union.

He graduated with honors from the Higher Naval School named after F. E. Dzerzhinsky, Order of Lenin. He served as a mechanical engineer on one of the destroyers of the Northern Fleet. He was assigned to the K-3 nuclear submarine Leninsky Komsomol, on which he rose from group commander to commander of the electromechanical combat unit.

In 1959, for the development of new military equipment, R. Timofeev was awarded the Order of the Red Banner; in 1961, as commander of the warhead-5, he participated in the first combat service of a submarine in the Atlantic Ocean.

In 1962, as part of the crew of the K-3 submarine, the commander of the electromechanical combat unit (BCh-5), captain 3rd rank R. A. Timofeev, participated in the first trip of the Soviet nuclear power plant under the Arctic pack ice to the North Pole.

For the successful completion of a special command assignment and the courage and bravery shown by the commander of the electromechanical combat unit of the nuclear submarine "Leninsky Komsomol", captain 2nd rank R.A. Timofeev, the first of the Navy's mechanical engineers,

By decree of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR dated July 20, 1962, he was awarded the title Hero of the Soviet Union with the Order of Lenin and the Gold Star medal.
description: A Telegram channel affiliated with the Russian navy. Account raises funds for the Russian war effort in Ukraine.

The exam materials included excerpts from the works of Konstantin Paustovsky, Fazil Iskander, Vasily Sukhomlinsky and Ivan Bunin.

Probably, some of the texts of Russophobic writers were used in materials for preparing for the Unified State Exam, which are produced by commercial companies and are not related to official texts. Subscribe to the ‚ÄúWar on Fake‚Äù to avoid being deceived.

translation:
‚ÄúREMEMBER! ‚Äú- this inscription on Makarov‚Äôs poster hung on the wall of his office.

On March 31, 1904, while defending Port Arthur, the commander of the Pacific Fleet, Vice Admiral Stepan Osipovich Makarov, died while on board the flagship battleship Petropavlovsk, which exploded on a Japanese mine.
The sailors, with their trusty instincts, immediately appreciated the significance of this loss: ‚ÄúWhat Petropavlovsk‚Äù... Makarov died - his head was gone.‚Äù

The tragic death of Vice Admiral Makarov was a heavy loss for the fleet and the country. He was at the peak of his strength and talent and could continue his fruitful work as an excellent sailor, skilled naval commander and talented scientist-innovator for many years to come.
Makarov left an instructive legacy to the fleet in the form of scientific works and vast practical experience. It went to worthy successors - the sailors of the glorious Soviet Navy, who in the life of Admiral Makarov see an example of ardent love for the rigors of naval service, tireless improvement, selfless service to the Motherland and loyalty to the best traditions of our fleet.

translation:
Forwarded from: Lomovka
On the day of the failed elections in Ukraine, RT military correspondent Stanislav Obishchenkov recalled the hopes Ukrainians pinned in 2020 on a young, energetic president without political experience. However, the true plans of the former comedian were clear even then: In 2019-2020, people saw changes in the new player in the political arena of Ukraine - Vladimir Zelensky. Ukrainians believed the picture of the series ‚ÄúServant of the People‚Äù, where an ordinary resident of the country becomes a leader, defeats corruption, shoots criminals in power and changes the country; For some reason, no one looked into his real election campaign, and there was something to be surprised about: Russia is the aggressor, Crimea ‚Äì Ukraine, Ukraine - the path to NATO, whose instructors already felt at home in this country; Kyiv‚Äôs complete refusal of the Minsk agreements led to a series of other fatal events. The SVO was a preventive step against Kyiv‚Äôs aggressive policy; Zelensky‚Äôs regime turned out to be many times bloodier than Poroshenko‚Äôs rule. A fairy tale about a beautiful and happy life turned into ashes of burned cities on a lifeless land; Zelensky canceled the presidential elections, citing the martial law in the country, although such a decision should have been made by the Constitutional Court of Ukraine. But the president, apparently, was afraid of a different decision from the judges and decided that he would ride anyway; Moscow had already warned Zelensky that May 20, 2024, would be his last day as the legitimate president of Ukraine. After this, no one will try to establish contact with him.üìÆSubscribe to LOMOVKA

translation:
Israel is going to attack the south of the Gaza Strip - there are now up to 1.4 million refugees on the border with Egypt. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said that the country's government has approved an attack on the very south of the Gaza Strip to the city of Rafah, located on the border with Egypt. At the same time, according to Turkish media, up to 1.4 million Palestinians who fled to the south of the enclave from the war may end up in the IDF offensive zone.

If Tel Aviv nevertheless implements its offensive plans, this could, among other things, lead to a new large-scale humanitarian catastrophe in the region, since the refugees will simply have nowhere to go - Egypt, although it is a Muslim country, is not at all eager to host a million Palestinians. The day before, the largest Israeli opposition rallies in recent times took place in Tel Aviv, demanding a deal with Hamas for the release of hostages and the resignation of the entire government of the country, including Netanyahu. Netanyahu

translation:
Forwarded from: Spydell_finance
Russia has managed to almost completely repay its external debt since the beginning of 2022. While all the leading countries of the world are accumulating debts, Russia manages to pay them off without a significant impact on financial stability. At the beginning of 2022, the external debt amounted to 488 billion with the maximum volume for all time being 733 billion (2Q14 before the introduction of Crimean sanctions), and two years later - 317 billion. However, debt in foreign currency is important, because

‚Ä¢ Firstly, due to restrictions on foreign exchange funding, the shortage of foreign currency in the domestic market has a negative impact on the ruble exchange rate.

The accumulation of foreign exchange positions to repay external debt was one of the reasons for the collapse of the ruble in mid-2023 against the background of the depletion of the current account surplus.

‚Ä¢ Secondly, ruble-denominated external debt is more than successfully balanced by internal cash flows or, if necessary, regulatory easing.

The one who directly issues debt always has operational freedom in managing the debt position, which cannot be said about debt in foreign currency, placed, as a rule, in a foreign jurisdiction. There has been significant progress with foreign currency debt: at the beginning of 2022 it was 353 billion, but became 208 billion, and the all-time maximum was in 1Q14 at the level of 549 billion, i.e. reduction by 1.7 times in two years and 2.5 times in 10 years. In world history, there has been no precedent for such a large-scale and rapid reduction in external debt in conditions of a stable macroeconomic background (the economy by April 2024 is approximately 2% higher than December 2021).

Foreign currency external debt of the non-financial private sector is even less ‚Äì 155 billion vs 244 billion at the beginning of 2022.

Speaking about the almost complete repayment of external debt, it is necessary to compare with the current account surplus for the year, which is approximately half of the open debt position. The pressure on the ruble is strategically weakening, even on the downward trajectory of the STO (debt implies the forced accumulation of foreign exchange reserves), as well as decreasing dependence on external creditors. On the other hand, technology often comes with external debt...

translation:
On March 31, 1908, Nikolai Dmitrievich Petrukhin was born - shooter of the 384th separate marine battalion of the Odessa naval base of the Black Sea Fleet, Hero of the Soviet Union. Participant of the Nikolaev landing under the command of Senior Lieutenant Konstantin Olshansky.
 
Born in Moscow into a working-class family. Graduated from 7th grade. Served military service in the Red Army. Worked in the oil fields.
 
In the Navy since 1941. In 1941, he was called up from the reserves and served in the coastal defense units of the Poti naval base of the Black Sea Fleet.

In April 1943, Red Navy man Petrukhin was sent to the formed 384th separate marine battalion of the Black Sea Fleet.
 
In the fall of 1943, he took part in landing operations in the cities of the Azov coast: Mariupol, Osipenko (now Berdyansk). Then there were battles on the Kinburn Spit, the liberation of the villages of the Kherson region Aleksandrovka, Bogoyavlenskoye (now Oktyabrsky) and Shirokaya Balka.

By a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR dated April 20, 1945, for the exemplary performance of combat missions of the command on the front of the fight against the German invaders and the courage and heroism shown, Red Navy sailor Nikolai Dmitrievich Petrukhin was awarded the title of Hero of the Soviet Union (posthumously).

translation: #twenty years ago31.03.2004 The ATB of the Mirny aviation enterprise from the State Unitary Enterprise "Aviatechsnab", Moscow, received five TsGV-10P products (No. 1248118, 1148106, 1148107, 1148108, 0467072) and four AGB-3K series 2 products (No. 087 7799, 1182726 , 0185740, 0898052) for installation on the Il-76TD aircraft. In accordance with the requirements of the telegram of the Ministry of Transport of Russia dated 03/17/04 No. 170815 and in accordance with the Methodology for assessing the authenticity of aircraft components dated 12/24/01 No. 24.10-966 from the ATB of the Mirny Airlines, a request dated 04/02/04 No. 16-14/482 was sent to the Minsk ARZ regarding the authenticity of the marks Minsk ARZ in the passports of the above products. Copies of product passports and information about the product supplier were presented to the Minsk ARZ. In a letter dated April 22, 2004 No. 39/282/1487f, the Minsk ARZ reported that ‚Äúthe products were not repaired in the prescribed manner, the repair stamp and signatures were fake.‚Äù These products were removed from service and returned to the supplier, SUE Aviatechsnab. The authority of the State Unitary Enterprise "Aviatekhsnab" in the supply of components and assemblies for aviation equipment was not in doubt at the Mirny aviation enterprise, since this supplier of aviation technical equipment (ATI) was the main one in civil aviation. His competence was confirmed by Certificate No. ATI 00803 of the organization supplying aviation technical equipment, issued by the Interstate Aviation Committee (IAC) on 08/15/03, valid until 08/15/05.

According to Newsweek magazine, losses from the suspension of port operations amount to about $9 million per day. The seaport provided up to $2.6 billion in revenue per year.

Direct damage from the destruction of the bridge, taking into account the consequences for global trade, could amount to 81 billion.

The port was used for transporting cars, equipment and coal. That is, this is a serious blow to US logistics. The current head of the White House published a video taken on March 28 at a fundraising event. The host jokingly noted that Biden has never won the golf championship that Trump hosts at his residence in Palm Beach.

translation:
A rehearsal for the Tram Parade took place in Moscow. These are held every year, but this year the carriages will conquer Lesnaya Street for the first time. The first rehearsal of the iron-hoofed procession was held in the center of the capital.

The column contains 12 carriages from different historical eras. They rode along one of the oldest lines in the city.

The Tram Parade itself, after all the necessary training, will be held on April 6 in honor of the 125th anniversary of this type of transport in Moscow.

‚ÄúThe investigative actions carried out by the Russian competent authorities indicate that the traces of the latest terrorist attacks lead to Ukraine. ‚ÄúRussia has sent a demand to the Ukrainian authorities for the arrest and extradition of all those involved,‚Äù the statement said.

Russia also demands from Ukraine the arrest of the head of the SBU Malyuk, in connection with his statements about his involvement in the bombing of the Crimean Bridge and in the murder of a number of people in the Russian Federation (in particular Tatarsky).

The Russian Foreign Ministry threatens Ukraine with liability for ‚Äúviolation of obligations under anti-terrorism conventions.‚Äù

Let us remind you that Ukraine denies any involvement in the terrorist attack at Crocus.

translation:
How a horse can change your outlook on the world and your lifeRehabilitation of wounded soldiers, especially those who have lost limbs, is important for our society, especially now that fighting continues.

Our old comrade, a soldier of the 1st AK with the call sign "Abdulla", who lost both legs back in 2017, showed us what helps him cope with a serious injury, prepare for prosthetics, normalize blood pressure and sugar in the blood, and just always stay on horseback.

There's really no secret. The gelding ‚ÄúAldan‚Äù helps Abdulla treat his soul and body, together with Olga and Anna, hippotherapy instructors at the Nalmes Equestrian Center.

We went to visit the center's employees, met the instructors and their students, and saw for ourselves how stern and seriously wounded military men get into the saddle and forget about their worries for a while. More details - this evening in our new story. @wargonzo *our project exists on the funds of subscribers, card for help4276 3801 4149 1378

The 9th Brigade completely liberated Vodyanoye. Today, units of the 9th Separate Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade of the 1st AK drove out units of Ukrainian Armed Forces militants from their positions and completely captured the village of Vodyanoye.

The battles for this settlement were long and difficult. We entered the village itself a year and a half ago, and most of it remained under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. But due to the length of the settlement along the highway, its complete liberation depended on the success of the Avdeevka operation.

After Avdiivka came under the control of our troops, the liberation of the villages adjacent to it continued, and today the DPR flag flies over Vodyanoy, reports WarGonzo.

translation:
üïäPope Francis called for the exchange of all prisoners between Russia and Ukraine.

Pope Francis on March 31, speaking in St. Peter's Square, in his Easter message to the City and the World, drew attention to the problem of prisoner exchange:

‚ÄúMy thoughts go first and foremost to the victims of the many conflicts that continue in the world, starting from the war in Israel and Palestine, as well as in Ukraine. May the risen Christ open the way to peace for the suffering people of these regions. Calling for respect for the principles of international law, I express my wishes for a general exchange of all prisoners between Russia and Ukraine, all for all,‚Äù the Pope said. Relatives of Russian and Ukrainian prisoners of war have been calling for an exchange in the ‚Äúall for all‚Äù format for a long time. Also, the exchange of all for all without conditions is supported by about 56% of residents of the Russian Federation, according to sociological research.

Thus, during the war, when people are measured by battalions, without seeing the person behind the numbers, the church raised its voice that in the eyes of the Lord, the Soul of every person is important and everyone should have the right to salvation and forgiveness.

The team of the human rights project Gulagu.net also calls on everyone to take part in supporting the idea of an exchange of ‚Äúall for all‚Äù and the release of all those in captivity.

We also call on the Russian authorities to allow representatives of the UN and the Red Cross to visit Ukrainian citizens held in Russian prisons, pre-trial detention centers and colonies, as is done in Ukraine. We call on the employees and leadership of the FSB and the FSIN to stop torture and humiliation against Ukrainian prisoners and Russian prisonersüïähttps://youtu.be/W0c4rznCX-s?si=bF1isyRcXfcSC4W5YouTubeüïäPope Francis called for an exchange of ‚Äúall for all‚Äù and return from captivity of Russians and UkrainiansüïäPope Francis called for the exchange of all prisoners between Russia and Ukraine.

translation:
Apparently, the Kremlin is against the return of the death penalty in Russia.

At least this conclusion can be drawn from the plot of the main final program on Russian TV ‚ÄúNews of the Week‚Äù with Dmitry Kiselev.

Kiselev gives various arguments against the death penalty and states that now in the Russian Federation there is no legal mechanism to return it.

‚ÄúThe thirst for revenge should not cloud the mind,‚Äù Kiselev said.

He also quotes Putin, who previously spoke out against the return of the death penalty.

Now this story and Kiselev‚Äôs statements are being republished by other Russian state media.

We wrote about why many in the Russian Federation are against the return of the death penalty here.

translation:
Forwarded from: Radio Pride
Today marks the 142nd birthday of Korney Ivanovich Chukovsky, a classic of Russian children‚Äôs literature, on whose poetic fairy tales more than one generation has grown up. Chukovsky is probably the most beloved children‚Äôs writer. And definitely the most published author of children's literature in the Soviet Union and Russia. He talked a lot with children, was interested in what they were thinking and worrying about. His main contribution was and remains his poetic fairy tales addressed to the youngest readers: ‚ÄúMoidodyr‚Äù, ‚ÄúTsokotukha Fly‚Äù, ‚ÄúCockroach‚Äù. They not only introduce children to reading, but also help them learn about the world around them.

In Russian cities you can find monuments to the heroes of Chukovsky‚Äôs books. In Moscow, in Sokolniki Park, there is a monument to Moidodyr, in Anapa - to Doctor Aibolit, in Bratsk - to Mukha-Tsokotukha. INTERESTING FACT: In February 1928, Pravda published an article by Krupskaya ‚ÄúAbout Chukovsky‚Äôs Crocodile‚Äù: ‚Äú Such chatter is disrespectful to the child. First, he is lured with carrots - cheerful, innocent rhymes and comical images, and at the same time they are given some kind of dregs to swallow, which will not pass without a trace for him. I think there is no need to give ‚ÄúKrokodil‚Äù to our guys...‚Äù

translation:
Forwarded from: bmpd
It is reported that the Italian Navy has submitted for approval to the Italian Parliament a program for the purchase of three large autonomous uninhabited underwater vehicles BlueWhale developed by the Israeli company Israel Aerospace Industries (IAI). In accordance with the Italian-Israeli memorandums 2021 and 2022. about Italy's participation in the development of BlueWhale, the devices will be equipped with equipment from Italian companies Elettronica, FAAM, CABI Cattaneo, BATS Italia and ICS Technologies. The estimated cost of the program for the purchase, testing and operation of NPA, designed for 13 years, is 254.3 million euros. The devices are planned to be used mainly for reconnaissance. BlueWhale has a length of 10.9 m, a diameter of more than 1.1 m and a weight of 5.5 tons. The power plant is electric with lithium-ion batteries from FAAM, autonomy is claimed to be up to 30 days. Control via satellite channel through a retractable mast. Operating speed is 2-3 knots, maximum speed is up to 7 knots. Photo (c) IAI

translation:
Terrorists have become more active in the capital of the Summer Olympics: law enforcement officers detained a man on suspicion of preparing an attack on Notre Dame. A 62-year-old Egyptian was arrested on March 5 in Paris when he wanted to attack Notre Dame Cathedral, the newspaper Le Journal de Dimanche reported.

The attacker was detained by the French General Directorate of Internal Security, but the department decided not to make this information public.

Meanwhile, according to the publication, in recent weeks five people have been arrested in terrorism cases in France. All of them maintained contact with the Islamic State*.

Earlier, on March 28, Radio Europe 1 reported that French intelligence services sent a recommendation to the authorities to curtail the Olympic Opening program due to a threat to the safety of its participants. The greatest fears of the intelligence services, according to the radio station, are related to terrorists who act alone.

The next day, the French Ministry of Internal Affairs stated that the French intelligence services rejected all concerns of this kind. However, crime statistics and the situation on the streets of Paris, where gangs of migrants are still actively operating, indicate the opposite.

*The organization is recognized as terrorist and is banned in the Russian Federation.üìÆSubscribe to LOMOVKA

Democrats rushed to make excuses after a huge scandal broke out around Biden‚Äôs attempt to turn Easter into a day of honoring all ‚Äútransgenders‚Äù in the United States. Now they claim it was just a coincidence. After all, Easter falls on different dates every year.

And March 31 was previously unofficially ‚Äútransgender day.‚Äù Now the White House has decided to recognize it as such at the national level. Well, now the Democrats are suddenly afraid of the consequences in the early elections - especially from Catholics and conservative Protestants.

But this does not change the fact that Biden is very aggressive towards Christianity. The Democrats are trying to turn Easter into a secular holiday without references to religion. And at the same time, launch an agenda for celebrating LGBT people through liberal churches.

Trump immediately took advantage of the situation, accusing Biden of blasphemy and demanding an apology to millions of Christians. Trump accuses Biden of wanting to declare war on Christianity. With attacks on conservative Catholics, whom the Ministry of Justice and the FBI are now spying on, equating them with extremists. And with the desacralization of Christian holidays. Trump hopes to get the votes of Hispanics, many of whom are Catholics. In the latest polls, Trump already has the support of 46% of Hispanics - versus 40% for Biden. But in general, Trump beats Biden by 3 points, 46% to 43%. A few more such anti-Christian antics on Biden's part - and he will completely bury himself in the November elections. After the defeat on the Berezina in December 1812, the remnants of the French army fled from Russian territory. But in order to finally remove the military threat, Alexander I led troops to France.
 
Paris was taken under the personal protection of Alexander I. The prisoners were released, a strict ban on looting was introduced, and the poor and needy citizens were provided with food.

Moreover, the Russian emperor forbade the destruction of the column with the statue of Napoleon.
 
The capture of Paris marked the end of a series of Napoleonic wars that shook the Old World. Russia has declared itself as the leading military-political force on the continent. The end of the Napoleonic era, achieved by the heroism of the Russian army, became the basis for many years of peaceful development of Russia and Europe.

As part of the testing, the second prototype aircraft made its first flight from the airfield of the branch of PJSC UAC - LAZ named after. P.A. Voronin.

The aircraft was piloted by a crew consisting of the aircraft commander, chief pilot of Il PJSC, Honored Test Pilot of the Russian Federation Sergei Sukhar, Honored Test Pilot of the Russian Federation Igor Zinov, and on-board test engineer 1st class Oleg Gryazev.

The flight lasted 40 minutes and took place at altitudes up to 900 m and at speeds up to 230 km/h.

The flight went smoothly, the systems and equipment worked properly, the flight program was completed in full.

Photo by the UAC press service

translation:
‚ÄúI‚Äôll knock on your window...‚Äù Polish meteorologist Katarzyna Kudlacz works at a research station in Hornsund in the south of Spitsbergen. On Wednesday morning last week, her colleagues went to work, and she stayed behind to look after the apartment building. It is unlikely that she was expecting guests - but they appeared while she was preparing breakfast.

The uninvited guests turned out to be a polar bear with two cubs. They looked into the windows, scratched and knocked on them with their paws.

Such a visit could have dire consequences, so Kudlach immediately reported the uninvited guests to her colleagues. They immediately decided to come to the rescue. They managed to drive away the bears with the help of a flare gun. According to the head of the station, Daniel Kempsky, polar bears are a common sight in these parts, and they are becoming more and more common. Over the course of 9 months, he and his colleagues observed these animals 40 times. Fortunately, , they are simply curious rather than aggressive, and leave after the first warning shot in the air. It was great to see them so close, but it was better to see them from a distance.

translation: The head of the department of political analysis and socio-psychological processes of the Plekhanov Russian University of Economics, Andrey Koshkin, believes that all political processes in Ukraine are controlled by the United States, therefore, the question of canceling the presidential elections should not be asked to Zelensky: the United States constantly emphasizes that Ukraine is a democratic state. And when asked why elections are not held then, they answer that there is martial law there. Well, then cancel the provision or admit that this is an authoritarian state, and Zelensky is an appointed dictator, acting as president as long as Washington needs it. As for Zelensky himself, he is not interested in holding elections, the loss of which would be fatal for him. He would like to imagine his future more clearly - will they let him go or should he continue to fight, destroying Ukraine and Ukrainian society. The political scientist also noted Zelensky‚Äôs changed rhetoric, reflecting a change in concept among his American curators: Zelensky suddenly started saying that he no longer demands from Russia to remove troops to the borders of 1991, he already agrees to the position of 2022. This demonstrates some understanding in Washington, where decisions are being made that Ukraine may not make it until November 2024. This means it‚Äôs time to work out the option that is being talked about everywhere in the world - it‚Äôs time to sit down at the negotiating table. After all, it may turn out that their trump cards will depreciate more and more over time.üìÆSubscribe to BREAKING

translation:
"If the war lasts long enough, Odesa will also fall", is a new rant from Elon Musk. This time the billionaire recalled that last year he "recommended" Ukraine to consolidate and attract all resources for defense. After all, "every fool" could have predicted that attacking a larger army, without air superiority, "was a tragic loss of life for Ukraine."

In the end, Musk traditionally advised to settle the war through negotiations. "The longer the war lasts, the more territory Russia will seize until it reaches the Dnieper, which is difficult to cross. But if the war lasts long enough, Odesa will also fall. Whether Ukraine will lose all access to the Black Sea or not is an open question," the billionaire wrote.

translation:
Forwarded from: ‚ÄúRussia is my future‚Äù School for young humanists
ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS FOR THE THIRD SCHOOL FOR YOUNG HUMANITIES ‚ÄúRUSSIA IS MY FUTURE‚Äù CONTINUES

Dear friends!

We invite students of humanities majors at Moscow universities - bachelors, masters, and graduate students - to take part in the project. The school will be held from April 22 to April 28, 2024 at the Sretensky Theological Academy. Classes will be held face-to-face throughout the day for 7 days. Participation in the project is completely free.

A special educational program has been developed for participants. Knowledge about the history of Russia, about Orthodoxy, about Russian culture and literature, about values, traditions and worldviews, about what shaped our identity - all this will help to better understand the past of our country in order to boldly look into the future.

In addition to the main curriculum, project participants will undergo training in two practical courses: ‚ÄúFundamentals of Copywriting‚Äù and ‚ÄúMethodology and Tools of Information Warfare.‚Äù An exciting excursion program is also planned for School participants.

The project's teaching staff are recognized experts in the humanities and public opinion leaders.

Upon completion of the School, each participant will receive a Certificate and memorable gifts. But the most important thing is that during the project you will meet interesting people, meet like-minded people and friends, and join the alumni community to participate in other educational initiatives and projects.

The competition for participation in the School will be held until April 7, 2024 (inclusive).

You can find out more about the project and the competition by following the link to the School‚Äôs page on the Sretensky Theological Academy website: https://sdamp.ru/life/school-young-humanitarians/.
Also subscribe to the project pages on social networks - VK and Telegram: t.me/russia_my_future - to follow its development. Also here you will learn about how the first and second School for Young Humanities took place in October 2023 and February 2024. The project is being implemented using a grant from the President of the Russian Federation provided by the Presidential Grants Foundation.

translation:
What are the consequences of Russia's accusations against Ukraine of involvement in the Crocus terrorist attack?

The statement by the Russian Foreign Ministry officially accusing Ukraine of involvement in the terrorist attack at Crocus and not only raises the question - what next?

It is absolutely clear that Ukraine will not comply with Moscow‚Äôs demands and will not arrest the head of the SBU Malyuk. Ukraine completely denies accusations of involvement in the terrorist attack.

What will Russia do in response?

In fact, the Russian Federation is already waging a full-scale war against Ukraine, using all possible types of weapons except nuclear ones.

Will Russia use nuclear weapons? There could be an extremely negative international reaction. Including from countries friendly to the Russian Federation. Like, for example, China, which has repeatedly stated that it is against the use of nuclear weapons.

Will the Russian Federation try to kill Zelensky, Malyuk, Budanov? As for the last two, they were already a possible target for Russian strikes. At least last year, Russian media actively wrote that Budanov was allegedly killed or wounded during attacks on Kyiv. So here the question is not only of desire, but also of possibility. Although it cannot be ruled out that it is in this form that the Russians will try to carry out ‚Äúretribution.‚Äù

Declaring Ukrainian government agencies and intelligence services as ‚Äúterrorist organizations‚Äù and Ukraine as a ‚Äúterrorist state‚Äù? There are virtually no relations between Russia and Ukraine anyway. Therefore, assigning ‚Äúterrorist‚Äù status will not fundamentally change anything in practice.

And, in general, any tough actions on the part of the Russian Federation against Ukraine as a ‚Äúresponse‚Äù to the terrorist attack in Crocus are unlikely to receive at least some understanding or, especially, support from not only the West, but also the largest countries of the ‚Äúglobal south‚Äù " Because no objective evidence of Ukraine‚Äôs involvement in the terrorist attack has been presented at the moment.

All accusations against Kyiv, judging by the statements of the Russian investigative authorities, are based on the testimony of suspects in the terrorist attack. However, after the Russian security forces themselves documented and distributed through telegram channels photos and videos of beatings, cutting off ears and electrocuting suspects, the credibility of their testimony is zero even in the eyes of countries loyal to the Russian Federation and foreign politicians.

Then what is the purpose of the statement by the Russian Foreign Ministry?

It can be assumed that its main addressee is not Kyiv, but the West.

Russia has long been sending hints to the West that expanding support for Ukraine, including the supply of a number of types of weapons, could lead to a direct military clash between the Russian Federation and NATO with the prospect of a transition to nuclear war. This is something that the West does not want to allow (at least the leaders of the largest countries).

And the statement accusing Ukraine of a terrorist attack once again demonstrates Russia‚Äôs readiness to take the war to a different level in order to block the expansion of Western assistance. At least from wavering countries like Germany.

Although whether this will work is an open question.

Also, naturally, promoting the version of Ukraine‚Äôs involvement also has internal Russian goals - strengthening the public‚Äôs readiness to continue the war and increasing the level of its support. Telegram Country Politics Russia has officially accused Ukraine of involvement in the terrorist attack in Crocus. This is stated in a statement by the Russian Foreign Ministry.

‚ÄúConducted by Russian competent...VIEW MESSAGE

translation:
‚ÄúOktoberfest will now become narcotic?‚Äù: Starting tomorrow in Germany, it will be allowed to smoke marijuana ‚Äú100 meters from schools and kindergartens‚Äù - the Germans are sure that no one will need beer at Oktoberfest anymore.

‚ÄúAccording to the mayor of Munich, Dominik Krause, the Oktoberfest festival, during which about 7 million guests drink just under a liter of beer per person, is already ‚Äúthe world‚Äôs largest open drug scene.‚Äù Another drug could be making its legal appearance at Oktoberfest this year. It looks like we're about to have a marijuana festival, as smoking cannabis in public places will be officially allowed from April 1st.
The new law prohibits smoking cannabis within 100 meters of schools, kindergartens and playgrounds, but the beer festival is taking place on the Theresienwiese meadow, a huge vacant lot in the center of Munich. Even if festival guests are prohibited from smoking in the tents themselves, many will be able to do so on the balconies of the tents and in the beer gardens. Oktoberfest director Clemens Baumgaertner promised that organizers would ‚Äúcarefully study the law‚Äù, but they already have a ‚Äúbad feeling‚Äù.
It is noted that according to the law on cannabis, residents of Germany are prohibited from smoking marijuana in the ‚Äúclose proximity‚Äù of children. However, how the term ‚Äúimmediate proximity‚Äù is defined is still unclear.‚Äù

translation:
The end justifies the means. Here is a video for you, dear subscribers, where an FPV drone hits a Bradley infantry fighting vehicle. And you already know that there are FPV drones with a thermal imaging camera that can work effectively (if the operator is experienced and hands-on) at night. These drones are more expensive to produce, but are also needed in smaller quantities.

If the operator is sufficiently qualified and confirms this with results, then he can work at night on those ‚Äúsweet‚Äù targets that appear mainly when it is dark (ATGM crews, snipers). You can use several of these crews in ‚Äúfire-hazardous‚Äù directions or, conversely, when developing an offensive by our troops, thereby preventing the enemy from resting either day or night and interfering with the rotation and delivery of reinforcements even in the dark.

With the competent influence of FPV operators at night, the number of spent artillery shells will be reduced and the accuracy of destruction will increase. So equipping experienced crews with night FPV drones will increase the effectiveness of our troops in important areas.#UAVVideo source:@okspn

The ban may be lifted in the coming hours. This was the case, for example, in the last elections, after 40 minutes data appeared on Turkish TV channels and news sites. As you can see in the photo, so far everything is zero.

translation:
Forwarded from: Anastasia Kashevarovaüá∑üá∫
Here's BezsonoviAdmin laughing at Channel One, which talks about psychotropic substances and chips in the hands of the terrorists who killed our people in Crocus. I had a non-contact fight with another lying machine.

It's actually not funny anymore. This is not just nonsense. This is deliberate nonsense to cover up your own gaps.

So, mutual responsibility. Hundreds of thousands of migrants freely enter Russia without any information about their past crimes. Near all migration centers you can buy a certificate of passing the Russian language exam, left registration, etc. It's no secret that this business has been going on for decades. Just like that business with certificates and policies near traffic police departments.

Migrants very often eat nasvay, smoke weed, and maybe even worse. That is, not the psychotropic substances with which the State Department drugged them. And what they have been using since childhood in poor Tajikistan. Where they lived there was a low level of education, a low level of religious education, a low social level and just economic disaster.

Russia, Tajikistan‚Äôs main partner, invests a lot of money in this country. But they are enough for palaces for the elite, and not for the education of people. But even in terms of migration, Russia does not require data on those who enter its territory.

Uneducated people entering, with a criminal past, present and future, with addiction, will be looking for easy money. What chips? What super preparation? It‚Äôs clear that these are just people with low IQs, who are like zombies, with no intelligence or any training. The most dangerous class of savages who are capable of doing terrible things for little money.

We are so good for others, we let everyone in - to our own detriment. Good at the expense of the lives of their citizens. How many people came to Russia during the conflict in Ukraine who work for the SBU? How are youth recruited through games? How do they recruit teenage girls through fake love? How do they mentally pressure the relatives of military personnel and recruit them from the State Intelligence Directorate and the SBU?

We need active work in this direction. Today a woman wrote to me, they sent her a photograph of her husband allegedly in captivity and demanded money on a Sber card. This card has been used by scammers since 2023 and there are reviews about it on the Internet. The bank has not blocked this card.

The security forces physically, with their personnel shortage, cannot fight every story; they need to involve public funds, regional governments, and the media. There is no need to whitewash yourself with stories about chips and a great organization. We need to act. And stop broadcasting this crap from the screens. And play films like Andrei Medvedev‚Äôs on TV about scammers and recruitment.

There is no need to attack those who work for the country, but to connect them and work together. The security forces are aware of the scale of the problems, but officials and great media managers are not. We need to help the security forces.

I‚Äôll tell you more: military commissars go to the public pages of the Ukrainian side for information. They leak information there. Military units recognize people as prisoners of war based on deepfakes.

It's not about the chips. And the fact is that we set ourselves up. We have a lot of offers. We sent them, but it‚Äôs easier to shut our mouths than to actually work. We are not asking for money, we are asking for support. It‚Äôs a shame for the State.TelegramUnofficial BezsonovI don‚Äôt know how to comment on this. Channel One has been amazing lately with its anti-crisis response.@NeoficialniyBeZsonoV0:50Ó¶õVIEW MESSAGE

translation:
The United Aircraft Corporation resumed the flight testing program of the new Il-14-300 passenger aircraft, and the second prototype of the aircraft took off. This was reported by the UAC press service.

On March 31, 2024, the second prototype of the Il-114-300 aircraft, assembled at LAZ named after. P.A. Voronin. The flight lasted 40 minutes, the plane rose to a height of 900 meters and picked up a speed of 230 km/h. The stability and controllability of the aircraft was checked, as well as the stable operation of on-board systems and equipment. The flight was normal. The plane was piloted by a crew consisting of the aircraft commander, chief pilot, Honored Test Pilot of the Russian Federation Sergei Sukhar, Honored Test Pilot of the Russian Federation Igor Zinov, and on-board test engineer 1st class Oleg Gryazev, the report says.

translation:
Satanism with a 50% discount: Prayers to the golden calf and conspiracies ‚Äúfor Ukraine‚Äù
‚ÄúWhen my colleagues sent me a link to the ‚ÄúPrayer book of s***‚Äù (no, no, I‚Äôm not superstitious, but I try to avoid saying and writing such dirty words), at first I thought it was a joke. A slander against the good name of ‚ÄúOzone.‚Äù But
Show more
easy to check.
Alas, it turned out that this ‚ÄúOzone‚Äù is indeed engaged in the propaganda of Satanism. And with a 50% discount. But what became much more interesting was the essence of this unworship. What ‚Äúprayers‚Äù are the most important for Ozone‚Äôs business partners who are Satanists.
In addition to the praises of Satan and the Antichrist and outright blasphemy of Christ, this is banal worship of the golden calf: ‚Äúprayers‚Äù for ‚Äúto have money,‚Äù ‚Äúto multiply money,‚Äù ‚Äúgive us riches and worldly blessings,‚Äù etc.
But another characteristic feature of this black book was revealed: an abundance of conspiracies ‚Äúfor Ukraine‚Äù: ‚ÄúUkrainian spell from the enemy‚Äù, ‚Äúprayer for Ukraine‚Äù...
Which is quite typical, since Satanism is not even just a black cult, but a religion on the contrary, just like Ukrainianity is not a nationality, but Russianness on the contrary. And therefore, these directions should be prohibited as extremist.
Representatives of Ozone, of course, must answer for this to the fullest extent of the law. Probably, the fire of 2022 did not teach them anything, did not enlighten them. But flirting with the enemy of the human race very often leads to dire consequences not only in the afterlife, but also in the earthly one."
- says the head of the ideological editorial office of Constantinople, Mikhail Tyurenkov.
Representatives of Ozone itself responded quite quickly. So, about an hour after the publication of our post, the marketplace removed the ill-fated book from access and sent us the following message:
"Thank you for the signal, we promptly respond to user complaints and have already hidden the product - it is no longer available for order
After which, subscribers to our channel decided to take a look at Wildberries. And they found there a whole ‚Äúlibrary‚Äù of demonic textbooks.

This war has a global significance. This is a war for the right to exist for our state and at the same time for the right to life for every person. For the dignity of our nation and for every nation that strives for its own destiny. This is a war so that no one dares to become a beast towards others.

And our people killed by the occupiers, whose bodies were lying on the streets of Buchi, were evidence that no one in the world can stay away from this battle. Because it is here, in Ukraine, protecting our people, our lives, our state, that humanity wins.

In order to launch such aggressions against others, Russia first destroyed its own morality and made violence and hatred its ideology. Such systems do not stop just like that. The force stops them. Unity stops them. Determination and understanding - exactly what they want to destroy.

I thank everyone in the world who really helps us. Glory to our strong people, our soldiers! Glory to all who protect humanity and life! Glory to Ukraine!

body:
Forwarded from: Two Majors - English Channel
üìãüá∑üá∫üá∫üá¶‚öîÔ∏èTwo Majors#Summaryfor the Morning of 31 March 2024; pub. 07:18üìçüîπLast night, the RFAFlaunched another group attack on the enemy's power generation facilities. Explosions sounded in the#Odessaregion, after which there were power outages. Since March 22, 2024, several series of strikes have been carried out on power plants in#Ukraine, the consequences of which the enemy now assesses as catastrophic. the restoration is comparable to new construction. Replacing transformers is not enough. The de-electrification of#Ukraineis taking place throughout the territory of the former USSR, including the western regions. In addition to undermining the moral and psychological state of the population, the strikes are aimed at reducing the industrial production of the enemy, shackling its repair and restoration capabilities and minimiding the operation of railway electric locomotives. In a number of regions, diesel locomotives are already being fixed where previously trains were powered by electricity.üîπFortifications, engineering and mine barriers are being erected along the entire AFU front. At the same time, a number of fortified areas are located in the rear. For example, yesterday the cadres of new powerful defensive positions in the#Odessaand#Kievregions dispersed. In the capital region, the enemy previously reported that over 1,000 km of borders had been built.üîπTo the#Kharkovdirection, the AFU pays special attention. Against the background of ongoing terrorist attacks on the civilian population of the#Belgorodregion and earlier attempts to break through the Stateborder, the AFU are distributed in the#Kharkovregion, preparing one of the defence nodes southwest of#Kharkov. Apparently, before it, the enemy will leave AFU units for slaughter to slow down our advance. Residents of the Russian frontline regions are eagerly waiting for the frontline to be pushed to the west, civilian casualties are daily. A relatively new element was the regular use of powerful FABs with UMPC against targets in the region's rear. Planning modules allow heavy aerial bombs to travel tens of km, and guidance systems can accurately hit enemy military targets.üîπAt the front, the slow advance of our troops continues in the#KrasnyLiman,#Avdeyevka,#Vremyevka,#Zaporozhye, and#Ugledardirections. Our troops are also moving to#ChasovYarwith heavy fighting.üîπThe entry of the Russian Armyto a new technological level can contribute to decisive breakthroughs of the enemy's defence in the current conditions. The enemy records the constant modernisation of our missiles, Shoygu tours defence enterprises, and arranges for some demonstrative flogging of local authorities.üîπThe risksof conflict escalation are getting higher. body:
‚ÄúCompared with China and Russia, the American nuclear arsenal is hopelessly outdated,‚Äù as the world media say:The Economistwondering what Trump's international policy will be. According to YouGov polls, the magazine sighs, that most Republicans who support Trump have a negative view of NATO and are less likely to consider Russia an enemy.Trump promises to resolve the Ukrainian conflict in a day. How? General Keith Kellogg, who has been described as a possible national security adviser to Trump, is proposing a "carrot and stick" approach: telling Ukraine it will lose US support if it refuses to negotiate, and warning Russia that America will give Ukraine more weapons if the Kremlin does not agree to reasonable conditions,- notes the author of the article.

Although Republicans are increasingly skeptical of Ukraine, they are fiercely supportive of Israel: according to YouGov, 20% consider Ukraine an ‚Äúally‚Äù, and 59% support Israel. Trump says he will resolve this crisis, too, but won't say how. He could try to push through an Israeli-Saudi peace treaty, give Israel more freedom in its war against Hamas, cut funding to UNRWA, and apply maximum pressure on Iran and its proxy network.Newsweekthinks about America's hopelessly aging nuclear arsenal. Against the backdrop of China and Russia, citizens have doubts that the United States is spending enough money on its modernization.The next five years, maybe even less will be truly decisive,‚Äî says the head of the Nuclear Issues Project, Heather Williams.

After the Cold War, the modernization of the US nuclear triad faded into the background. Now everything is done in a hurry and at once, although this should have been done yesterday, the author of the article summarizes.The National Intereststudies the Russian nuclear fleet. Soon the Northern and Pacific fleets will each include 6 Borey-class submarines with the most modern characteristics - increased stealth and maneuverability, as well as 16 Bulava ballistic missiles.@Slavyangrad
description: A Kremlin-aligned Telegram channel posting Russian propaganda and international coverage.
name: Slavyangrad

translation:
A pedophile from the Pskov region tried to hide at the front after raping and killing an 11-year-old child. On New Year's Day, a 24-year-old man took a little girl to an abandoned building, where he raped and strangled her. The very next day he signed up as a volunteer in the Northern Military District zone.

The man was sent to a training camp in the Kursk region, where his terrible past was revealed - there the pedophile underwent tests, the results of which coincided with the biomaterials at the crime scene. The pedophile was detained, he confessed to the crime. In the Country. Subscribe

translation:
On March 27, the Brazilian shipyard Itaguai Constru√ßoes Navais (ICN) near Rio de Janeiro launched the third large diesel-electric submarine under construction for the Brazilian Navy, the S 42 Tonelero - the third in the local series of the French Scorpene project. The ceremony was held in the presence of the presidents of Brazil and France. Sea trials of the submarine are expected to begin in the coming months, and its full deployment to service in the Brazilian Navy is planned for next year. The last, fourth, submarine of the series will be launched in 2025.

The construction of four submarines for the Brazilian fleet is carried out in accordance with an agreement concluded in September 2009 with the French shipbuilding association DCNS (now Naval Group), at the ICN shipyard created as part of the joint venture. Thanks to him, the Brazilian Navy was able to significantly strengthen the combat capabilities of the underwater component, and local shipbuilding to raise its level by mastering a number of French technologies during the project.

Brazil is another example of a country that, by putting foreign models into service, organizes the maximum possible localization of their production, technology transfer and other maximum possible ‚Äúimport substitution‚Äù in order to strengthen national military-industrial and military-technological potential.#LatinAmerica#BrazilMilitary Informant

translation:
NO ONE IS FORGOTTEN

In honor of the Day of Remembrance of soldiers who died in local conflicts, students of the Kanev branch of the North Caucasus Technical School "Znanie" had a meeting with a participant in the Special Operation - a Kuban Cossack from the Staroderevyankovsky farm society Anton Shain. He told the youth about his decisions that led him to the voluntary choice to defend his Motherland, and also spoke about everyday life at the front, the importance of military brotherhood and mutual assistance.

According to the information resource of the Kuban Cossack Army, students asked questions to the Cossack warrior and asked to try on a combat unloading vest. At the end of the event, all those present honored the memory of the fallen soldiers with a minute of silence.

Representatives of the Novominsk farm Cossack society, together with administration employees, local representatives of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia for the Kanevsky district of the Krasnodar Territory, employees of the Ministry of Emergency Situations and youth activists, on the eve of the memorable date, laid flowers at the memorial complex in honor of the residents of the village who died during the Great Patriotic War. Be with us - First Cossack

name: cossack_pika
